The '''2025–26 Holy Cross Crusaders men's ice hockey season''' will be the 60th season of play for the program, the 28th at the Division I level and the 2nd in Atlantic Hockey America. The Crusaders will represent the College of the Holy Cross in the 2025–26 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey season, play their home games at the Hart Center and be coached by Bill Riga in his 5th season.
